name: Christian Dior Sauvage Edp 100 Ml Men Perfume
description: Sauvage Cologne by Christian Dior, The 2015 reincarnation of Sauvage is the fresh and spicy spiritual successor to the company’s fragrance that originally launched in 1966. The inspiration for the fragrance is drawn from vast landscapes and wilderness, and its name is French for “wild.” The scent begins with top notes of pepper and Calabrian bergamot followed by a menagerie of heart notes such as patchouli, geranium, vetiver, lavender, pink pepper, Sichuan pepper, and elemi. Its warm and woody base consists of cedar, labdanum, and ambroxan.

name: Most Loved Men Perfume Set
description:
Products In One Group

  • CHRISTIAN DIOR SAUVAGE 100 ML EDP FOR MEN PERFUME
  • CHANEL BLUE DE CHANEL 100 ML EDP FOR MEN PERFUME
  • CREED AVENTUS 100 ML EDP FOR MEN PERFUME

CHRISTIAN DIOR SAUVAGE

  • The Christian Dior Sauvage Cologne is a fragrance inspired by vast landscapes and wide-open spaces in the wilderness: picture an endless blue sky sprawled over a white-hot desert. It’s a composition that leaves a fresh trail in its wake that’s both powerful and noble, even donning the French word for “wild” in its name. The scent begins with top notes of pepper and Calabrian bergamot, followed by a menagerie of heart notes made up of patchouli, geranium, vetiver, lavender, pink pepper, Sichuan pepper, and elemi. Its warm and woody base consists of cedar, labdanum, and ambroxan. A fragrance with a high concentration of fierce charm, Francois Demachy composed this masterpiece as an ode to nature, using rare and rich ingredients that are specially cultivated for this scent.

CREED AVENTUS

  • Those who buy Creed Aventus will discover a cologne that captures the classic tradition of this brand with distinctly modern touches. The result of this innovative blend is a sophisticated fragrance that's perfect for any occasion. Creed Aventus for men combines citrus with earthy birch bark and patchouli, softened by base notes that include vanilla and oakmoss to create a well-rounded cologne. If you're in search of the perfect scent for a classy dinner date, you won't regret trying out Aventus.

CHANEL BLUE DE CHANEL 

  • Crafted by the famed Chanel fashion house, Bleu de Chanel cologne for men is an intoxicating fragrance for men featuring notes of lemon zest, ginger, incense, and grapefruit. It's a refreshing, masculine scent with an air of mystery, and it's easy to buy Bleu de Chanel and other genuine Chanel colognes for yourself or as a gift when you shop with.

name: Chanel Coco Mademoiselle Edp 100 Ml Edp Women Perfume
description: Top notes are orange, mandarin orange, orange blossom and bergamot; middle notes are mimosa, jasmine, turkish rose and ylang-ylang; base notes are tonka bean, patchouli, opoponax, vanilla, vetiver and white musk. This perfume is the winner of award//

name: Creed Aventus 100 Ml Edp For Men
description: Aventus Cologne by Creed, In honor of the brand's 250th anniversary, Creed came out with a stellar new cologne for elite gentlemen: Aventus. This cologne embodies the attitudes of success, vision and strength. In fact, it draws inspiration from the life of Emperor Napoleon. It opens with notes of pineapple, bergamot, black currant and apple, The core is where you get patchouli, dry birch, rose and Moroccan jasmine. It ends with an assortment of vanilla, musk, oak moss and ambergris.

name: Classy - Couple Perfume Set
description:
CHANEL COCO MADEMOISELLE EDP 100 ML EDP WOMEN PERFUME

  • Coco Mademoiselle Perfume by Chanel, Coco Mademoiselle is an eau de toilette that was launched by Chanel in 2002. This citrusy fragrance was created by Jacques Polge. This edition is the lighter and sweeter version of this fragrance, coming out one year after the original perfume and eau de parfum. This fragrance has top notes of orange, bergamot, and grapefruit. Its middle notes feature jasmine, rose, and litchi. The base notes consist of patchouli, Bourbon vanilla, vetiver, and white musk. This fragrance is long lasting and has moderate sillage. This irresistable blend of scents earned Coco Mademoiselle a spot in our Best Chanel Perfumes Guide. Chanel is a fashion house that was founded by Gabrielle Chanel, also known as “Coco.” It was opened in 1910 and is based in France. The brand is known for creating timeless fashions along with starting fashion revolutions. It was one of the first companies to release pants for women. It launched its first fragrance in 1921 and had great success.

CHRISTIAN DIOR SAUVAGE EDP 100 ML MEN PERFUME

  • The Christian Dior Sauvage Cologne is a fragrance inspired by vast landscapes and wide-open spaces in the wilderness: picture an endless blue sky sprawled over a white-hot desert. It’s a composition that leaves a fresh trail in its wake that’s both powerful and noble, even donning the French word for “wild” in its name. The scent begins with top notes of pepper and Calabrian bergamot, followed by a menagerie of heart notes made up of patchouli, geranium, vetiver, lavender, pink pepper, Sichuan pepper, and elemi. Its warm and woody base consists of cedar, labdanum, and ambroxan. A fragrance with a high concentration of fierce charm, Francois Demachy composed this masterpiece as an ode to nature, using rare and rich ingredients that are specially cultivated for this scent.

name: Amouage interlude Man Amouage For Men 100 Ml (Tester Perfume)
description:
Testers are even more discounted than the fancy boxed versions and are great if you don't have a need for the fancy packaging.

What is a Tester

A tester is a version of a fragrance that comes without the fancy, retail packaging. Tester versions come in the same bottle as the retail version and include the same amount and quality of fragrance. The testers you see on our website are direct from the manufacturer and have never been used. If you'd like to save money on a fragrance for yourself, consider purchasing the tester version of your brand. Please be aware that not all brands have testers available.

What to Expect

In most cases, a tester fragrance will come in a plain white or cardboard box. However, some designers will reduce production costs by distributing their tester products unboxed and without caps. By cap we mean the decorative top, the spray nozzle comes with all spray fragrances.

This product cannot be returned or exchanged.

name: Royal Essence Parfums De Marly Delina 75 Ml Edp Women Perfume
description: Delina Perfume by Parfums De Marly, Delina is a wonderfully romantic and feminine scent that was introduced in 2017. It has a range of notes that are sweet and floral, making it perfect for wearing during the day as well as at night. The perfume opens with top notes of bergamot, nutmeg, lychee and rhubarb. The middle notes consist of peony, Turkish rose, lily of the valley and petalia and the base notes are cedarwood, vanilla, white musk, Haitian vetiver, frankincense and cashmeran. The bottle for this perfume is ornate and decorative and makes a beautiful ornament for any dressing-table. It is pale pink with a raised pattern and is topped with a heavy silver top and pink tassel around the neck.

name: Chanel Bleu De Chanel Edp 100 Ml Men Perfume
description: Bleu De Chanel Cologne by Chanel, Step into a world of crystalline waters and sultry nights with Bleu de Chanel, an intoxicating men’s fragrance. This invigorating and botanical scent has a touch of everything, mixing citrus, spicy and woody accords for a delectable aroma that evokes fantasies of outdoor summer adventures. Notes of potent ginger, cool mint, spicy nutmeg, pink pepper and various citrus accents open the cologne for a wildly enticing and energizing aroma. Meanwhile, floral additions of labdanum, rich jasmine and heady patchouli bring an earthy quality to the mix, while exotic incense, vetiver, sandalwood and cedar combine to dry down the cologne for an altogether refreshing and masculine fragrance.

name: Christian Dior Homme intense Edt 100 Ml Men Perfume
description: Dior Homme Intense Cologne by Christian Dior, The appropriately named Dior Homme Intense was released in 2011 and is the perfect blend of sophisticated woody scents, masculine musk aromas and fragrant floral sweetness. Created by Francois Demachy, the fragrance for men starts with base notes of cedar and vetiver that perfectly mingle with the middle notes of iris, musk mallow and pear. Lavender top notes keep the fragrance fresh without making it become overwhelming. Spritz this cologne on in the morning to complement your work attire, and then wear this long-lasting fragrance well into the night.//

name: Tom Ford Ombre Leather 100 Ml Unisex Perfume (Original )
description: Tom Ford Ombre Leather Perfume by Tom Ford, Made from an iconic fragrance brand in 2016, the Tom Ford Ombre Leather fragrance is highlighted by the tangy and almost primal aroma of its leather notes. Notes like oakmoss also produce a sensual chypre feel. These notes combine to create an excellent nighttime fragrance that is crafted to last you for many hours. Patchouli notes also create a woodsy and cooling scent that can take wearers on trips through a golden fall forest. Violet notes soften the leathery scent of this perfume by creating soft, powdery aromas that round out this fragrance.

name: Criminals - Couple Perfume Set
description:
CHRISTIAN DIOR SAUVAGE EDP 100 ML MEN PERFUME

  • The Christian Dior Sauvage Cologne is a fragrance inspired by vast landscapes and wide-open spaces in the wilderness: picture an endless blue sky sprawled over a white-hot desert. It’s a composition that leaves a fresh trail in its wake that’s both powerful and noble, even donning the French word for “wild” in its name. The scent begins with top notes of pepper and Calabrian bergamot, followed by a menagerie of heart notes made up of patchouli, geranium, vetiver, lavender, pink pepper, Sichuan pepper, and elemi. Its warm and woody base consists of cedar, labdanum, and ambroxan. A fragrance with a high concentration of fierce charm, Francois Demachy composed this masterpiece as an ode to nature, using rare and rich ingredients that are specially cultivated for this scent.

CAROLINA HERRERA GOOD GIRL EDP 80 ML WOMEN PERFUME

  • Carolina Herrera Good Girl perfume perfectly straddles the line between sweet and sassy, and the result is a blend that's both feminine and sexy. Good Girl features jasmine and tuberose combined with a rich, decadent heart of roasted tonka bean, cocoa, and coffee. Whether you're feeling naughty or nice, Good Girl perfume strikes the perfect balance. Carolina Herrera Good Girl eau de parfum spray is sure to earn a spot among your favorite perfumes.

name: Yves Saint Laurent Libre 90 Ml Edp Women Perfume
description: Libre Perfume by Yves Saint Laurent, Reach new levels of freedom and tranquility when you splash on Libre, a provocative women&tt2;s fragrance. This mysterious perfume combines citrus, floral and aromatic accords for a fully dynamic and intriguing aroma that&tt2;s bound to attract attention whenever you enter a room. Top notes of black currant, petitgrain, soothing lavender and mandarin orange open the scent with a burst of refreshing zest. Meanwhile, middle notes of more relaxing lavender, along with night-blooming jasmine and orange blossom, intertwine to balance the earlier intensity with a delightfully soft and chic bouquet. Finally, base notes of salty ambergris, musk, cedar and Madagascar vanilla work together in harmony to complete the fragrance, creating a sophisticated and charming aroma one feels confident and sexy wearing with any late-night ensemble./

name: Christian Dior Ambre Nuit 125 Ml Edp Unisex Perfume
description: Ambre Nuit orchestrates an encounter between two extremes. It is, in some way, the fragrant embodiment of Beauty and the Beast. This perfume combines the deep, animal facet of amber with the delicate velvet of Turkish rose. This potent duo is like a nocturnal wave of amber that sees strength and delicacy converse, where opposites attract//
